events.name: GDG #6 - Adding Tests, Refactoring, & Evolving Android Code
events.description:
En cette p√©riode de confinement, nous essayons de garder la communaut√© connect√©e !

Et l'√©quipe organisatrice du Droidcon en Italie a eu une super id√©e, avec la mise place d'une s√©rie de webinaires.

Le premier de la s√©rie s'intitule, Adding Tests, Refactoring, & Evolving Android Code from Jorge D. Ortiz Fuentes

Si vous souhaitez y participer il vous suffit de vous inscrire via le lien ci-dessous :

https://www.eventbrite.it/e/droidcon-italy-webinar-series-registration-101088177460?ectid=225862&ectttl=7&ectmode=campaign

Nous essayerons via le groupe Meetup du GDG Aix-Marseille, de s√©lectionner quelques talk sympa √† suivre de chez vous pendant la dur√©e du confinement.

En esp√©rant que tout le monde se porte bien. Je vous souhaite une bonne conf, et surtout, restez chez vous !

Je vous met ici la description compl√®te de la conf√©rence :

Dear droidcon Italy follower,

We want to let you know that we're launching the droidcon virtual series with a series of webinars coming straight to your device.

Free to attend, these webinars give you access to presentations from the excellent droidcon Italy network, allowing you to upskill and to connect with the Android community.

Here's the first of our webinars, designed for you:

7 April, 15:00 (CET). Free to attend. Powered by Bluetooth.

Adding Tests, Refactoring, & Evolving Android Code from Jorge D. Ortiz Fuentes

Is your Android project hard to maintain and evolve? Do you want to take control of it? In this webinar Jorge will show you some techniques to do it that can be applied to your Kotlin codebase.

Each webinar presentation will be approximately 45 minutes, with unlimited q&a time at the end, so you're sure to have your questions answered!

We're looking forward to connecting, sharing and learning together, wherever we are.

See you online!

Cheers, droidcon Italy team.
